content.p:
ยง 463. Review. All questions of fact arising under this article shall
be decided by the commissioner and there shall be no appeal from such
decision on any such question of fact. Upon the entry of an order issued
under sections four hundred fifty-nine and four hundred sixty of this
article, any party aggrieved thereby may commence a proceeding for
review thereof pursuant to article seventy-eight of the civil practice
law and rules within thirty days from the notice of the filing of the
said order in the office of the commissioner. Said proceeding shall be
commenced directly in the appellate division of the supreme court.
Nothing in this section shall in any way limit, qualify or prevent the
commissioner from destroying explosives as provided under section four
hundred sixty of this article.
